text: The Mascareen Peninsula (pronounced: (mas-kuh-REEN)) is located in Saint George Parish, Charlotte County, in southwestern New Brunswick, Canada. It is situated on the eastern side of Passamaquoddy Bay, opposite St. Andrews. The peninsula is in length and in width. The villages of L'Etete, L'Etang, and Back Bay are located on the Mascareen Peninsula. ==References== Category:Landforms of Charlotte County, New Brunswick Category:Peninsulas of New Brunswick
title: Mascareen Peninsula
